body: If you are reading this comment your parents will *** within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.

Guess what? It has actually sold like shit. Released since 3 months ago and has made barely over 300 sales. NTR doesn't sell that good unless you're a somewhat known author. It's just not that cheap and easy anymore.
Ofcourse it's cucking. Easy to make. No need to think of how the characters should. Excellent copy paste for maximum effortless money. Why try when you have people who buy this crap xd
